entry.title: Here is my first blog with Hexo
entry.content:
Celebration!

Itâ€™s excited that I established my own blog. But I have remember why I want to establish a personal blog. For me not forget the origin heart, I written them down!

Why I established this website?

  1. Record coding history, write the steps and methods.
  2. Pratice written English for futrue plan.
  3. Nourish a good habit for work.
  4. Build a platform for my literary creation.

Thanking list
